title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1040 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of The Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of The Staten Island Rapid Transit Operating Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1040 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of The Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of The Staten Island Rapid Transit Operating Authority

§ 1040.1 - Authorization and purpose
§ 1040.2 - Definitions
§ 1040.3 - Construction
§ 1040.4 - General provisions
§ 1040.5 - Prohibited uses
§ 1040.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse
§ 1040.7 - Hygiene
§ 1040.8 - Animals barred from terminal
§ 1040.9 - Firearms or other weapons
§ 1040.10 - Explosives, acids, inflammables, compressed gases, and other dangerous substances
§ 1040.11 - Unauthorized interference with or use of systems or equipment prohibited
§ 1040.12 - Enforcement
§ 1040.13 - Public notice of the provisions of New York Penal Law Section 165.16 (as added by chapter 57 of the Laws of 2005)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1040

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§1203-a, 1205, 1265, 1266

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
